name: Dreadnaught Bracers
tooltip:
Dreadnaught BracersLevel 60

Korfax at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreadnaught Bracers if you bring him the following items: 1 Desecrated Bracers, 6 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Bracers
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 6
- Arcanite Bar
- Nexus Crystal
